Description: THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THECONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO AUGMENT NCTC PHYSICAL SECURITY BY HAVING AN INDIVIDUAL PREFERABLY WITH LAW ENFORCEMENT EXPERIENCE TO ROAM THE NCTC CAMPUS. THE INDIVIDUAL WILL ROAM THE MAIN CAMPUS BUILDINGS INCLUDING LODGES DURING THIS TIME AND CHECK-IN WITH CONTRACT SECURITY ON ROUTINE BASIS VIA GOVERNMENT PROVIDED 2 WAY RADIO. INDIVIDUAL IS ENCOURAGED TO INTERACT WITH GUEST IN A FRIENDLY PROFESSIONAL MANNER DURING THEIR ROUNDS AND REPORT ANY BEHAVIOR THAT IS IN CONFLICT WITH NCTC CONDUCT POLICY TO NCTC CONTRACT SECURITY THAT IS LOCATED AT THE MAIN ENTRANCE OF THE CAMPUS. IT IS ALSO REQUESTED THAT THIS POSITION REPORT ANY VISIBLEMAINTENANCE ISSUES (FLOOD, SMOKE,ETC) TO NCTC CONTRACT SECURITY AND ON DUTY MAINTENANCE CONTRACTOR IMMEDIATELY.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO PROVIDE ORGANIZING, SORTING, SCANNING, INVENTORYING AND BOXING UP SERVICES FOR THE CULTURAL RESOURCES FEDERAL RECORDS FOR THE MIDWEST REGION AT THE MIDWEST REGIONAL OFFICE IN BLOOMINGTON, MN.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO ASSIST THE COMPLEX WITH GETTING ON-SITE RECORDS IN COMPLIANCE THROUGH INVENTORYING AND DIGITIZING RECORDS, TRANSFERRING RECORDS FOR OFF-SITE RETENTION, PREPARING RECORDS FOR DISPOSITION AND DEVELOPING AN ONGOING FILE PLAN FOR THE COMPLEX. ADDITIONALLY THEY WILL ASSIST WITH THE INVENTORY, COORDINATION AND TRANSFER OF OTHER MATERIALS AND PROPERTY (DISPLAYS, MOUNTS, ETC.) BETWEEN OLD AND NEW VISITOR CENTERS VISITOR CONTACT STATIONS AT BOTH REFUGES.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THECONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO SUPPORT 67 NATIONAL WILDLIFE REFUGES, 4 MARINENATIONAL MONUMENTS, NUMEROUS NATIONAL FISH HATCHERIES, AND PRIVATE LANDS BIOLOGISTS WORKING FOR THE U.S. FISH  WILDLIFE SERVICE IN OREGON, IDAHO, WASHINGTON, HAWAII, AND THE PACIFIC ISLANDS. PROVIDE BIOLOGICAL EXPERTISE,PROJECT ADVICE, AND TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE ON THE APPLICATION OF INTEGRATED PEST MANAGEMENT TECHNIQUES ANDPRACTICES AS THEY RELATE TO INVASIVE SPECIES, FARMING PROGRAMS, AND WILDLIFE AND HABITAT MANAGEMENT.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO ASSIST IN DRAFTING, REVIEWING, AND COMPLETING VARIOUS DOCUMENTS ASSOCIATED WITH THE LAND ACQUISITION PROCESS.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO CONDUCT AN ECONOMIC ANALYSIS OF THE SERVICES PERMITTING PROGRAMS, INCLUDING WORKLOAD, FEE STRUCTURE, AND ECONOMIC VALUE OF PERMITS.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO PROVIDE GRAPHIC DESIGN SUPPORT FOR SIGNS, PUBLICATIONS, AND OTHER PRODUCTS FOR REGIONAL AND FIELD STATION USE.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO  COORDINATE THE CONTENT WRITING AND EDITING, DESIGN AND PRODUCTION OF MATERIALS FOR WRITTEN OR ORAL DISSEMINATION AS PART OF THE PLANNING PROCESS.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD A TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKER (AGE 55 OR OLDER) THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM (ESP) TO THE REGION 5 WSFR TO SERVE AS A GRANTS MANAGEMENT SPECIALIST WHO WILL SUPPORT THE AGENCY S MISSION BY: CONDUCTING PROGRAMMATIC AND FISCAL REVIEW OF GRANT APPLICATIONS  PROVIDING TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE TO GRANTEES  SUPPORTING PROGRAMMATIC AND POLICY WORK FOR WSFR REGIONALLY AND NATIONALLY  SUPPORTING DRAFTING RESPONSES AND REVIEWING CORRECTIVE ACTIONS FOR AUDITS  AND COMPLETING SPECIAL ASSIGNMENTS.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO 1) PROVIDE LEGAL ADVICE, ANALYSIS AND SUPPORT ON COMPLIANCE AND PERMITTING TASKS ASSOCIATED WITH THE PROJECT  AND (2) COMMUNICATE AND NEGOTIATE WITH FEDERAL, STATE AND LOCAL AGENCIES TO COMPLETE COMPLIANCE AND PERMITTING TASKS FOR THE PROJECT.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO LEAD THE EXPANSION OF WSFR S TRACS DATA SYSTEM TO ACCOMMODATE TWO NEW PROGRAMS.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THECONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO PRIMARILY WORK BY COMPLETING TWO FORMAL SECTION 7CONSULTATIONS WITH USDA APHIS: 1) WI BEAVER DAMAGE MANAGEMENT ACTIVITIES AND GRAY WOLF AND 2) MN OTHER ANIMAL DAMAGE MANAGEMENT ACTIVITIES AND GRAY WOLF. SECONDARY WORK CONSISTS OF LOW-MODERATE COMPLEXITY, MULTI-SPECIES INFORMAL CONSULTATIONS AS TIME ALLOWS.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO PROVIDE SUMMARY AND TABLES OF THE FOLLOWING TOPICS THAT CAN BE USED IN THE SUPPLEMENTAL EA AS PART OF THE AFFECTED ENVIRONMENT SECTIONS. THE AREA OF CONSIDERATION INCLUDES GENESEE AND ORLEANS COUNTY AND THE TOWNS OF ALABAMA AND SHELBY: TOPICS WOULD BE SOCIOECONOMICS WITH DEMOGRAPHICS AND EMPLOYMENT AND ENVIRONMENTAL JUSTICE CONCERNS INCLUDING LOW-INCOME POPULATIONS AND MINORITY POPULATIONS. ASSIST WITH OTHER REVIEW AND WRITING OF SECTIONS OF THE EA IF TIME PERMITS.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THECONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO PROCESS PERMIT APPLICATIONS FOR ENDANGERED ANDTHREATENED SPECIES RECOVERY PERMITS. PREPARE DRAFT PERMITS FOR SIGNATURE.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO COMPLETE PROGRAMMATIC CONSULTATION SPREADSHEET (LIST OF ALL APPLICABLE PROGRAMMATIC CONSULTATION IN LFO INCLUDING DATE, AGENCY, ACTIONS COVERED, AND EXPIRATION DATE), COMPLETE LOC FOR INFORMAL CONSULTATIONS DURING PERIOD OF WORK ASSIGNED TO ENROLLEE (INCLUDING COMMENTS ON DRAFT BAS AND ATTENDING MEETINGS) AND COMPLETE BOS FOR FORMAL CONSULTATIONS DURING PERIOD OF WORK ASSIGNED TO ENROLLEE (INCLUDING COMMENTS ON DRAFT BAS AND ATTENDING MEETINGS).

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THECONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO SERVE AS USFWS, NWRS, INVENTORY AND MONITORINGPOLLINATOR SURVEY COORDINATOR. AND TRAIN STAFF.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THECONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO CONDUCT HABITAT IMPROVEMENT   RESTORATION PROJECTS FOR THE BENEFIT OF MIGRATORY WATERFOWL THROUGH THE OPERATION OF HEAVY EQUIPMENT  TO MAINTAIN HEAVY EQUIPMENT ANDIMPLEMENTS  AND TO IMPROVE REPAIR REFUGE INFRASTRUCTURE   ASSETS.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO INCLUDE MEETING, GREETING, AND ASSISTING VISITORS IN THE VISITORS CENTER, FIELDING PHONE CALLS, HELPING WITH SPECIAL USE PERMITS, AND STOCKING BROCHURES.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO PROVIDE MAINTENANCE AND CLEANING OF SHOP AREA AND EQUIPMENT  MOWING OF VISITOR CENTER GROUNDS, WILDLIFE DRIVE, SHOP AREA, AND BUNKHOUSE AREA  MOWING AND GRADING OF REFUGE ROADS AND ATV TRAILS  REPAIR OF REFUGE ROADS AND ATV TRAILS  MOWING AND DISKING OF MOIST SOIL UNITS AND OPEN FIELDS  MINOR REPAIR OF EQUIPMENT AND BOARDWALK, BUNKHOUSE, SHOP, AND VISITOR CENTER.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THECONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO PROVIDE ADMINISTRATIVE SUPPORT TO THE AK REGIONALAVIATION MANAGEMENT PROGRAM.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THECONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO FOCUS ON HABITAT MANAGEMENT AND INVASIVE PLANT CONTROL AT BOMBAY HOOK NWR AND PRIME HOOK NWR. THE WORK WILL INCLUDE MAPPING INVASIVE PLANTS, PRIORITIZING CONTROL AND TREATMENT NEEDS, AND CONDUCTING THE MECHANICAL AND CHEMICAL TREATMENT MANAGEMENT ACTIONS PRESCRIBED BASED ON MAPPING AND PRIORITIZATION.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO BE RESPONSIBLE FOR ASSISTING WITH GRANT AND COOPERATIVE AGREEMENT APPLICATION DOCUMENTATION FOR NEW AWARDS, MODIFICATIONS, AND CLOSEOUTS AS WELL AS ASSISTING WITH MONITORING ACTIVITIES SUCH AS REPORT COMPLIANCE DOCUMENTATION. COMMUNICATES WITH, SUPPORTS, AND ASSISTS EXTERNAL PARTNERS WITH ENROLLMENT, FORMS, AND REPORTING PROCEDURES. SUPPORTS GRANT SOLUTIONS LEARNING AND EDUCATION FOR US FWS PRACTITIONERS. TROUBLESHOOT DIFFICULTIES WITH GRANT SOLUTIONS SOFTWARE PLATFORM AND INTERNAL PROCEDURES WHILE PROVIDING FEEDBACK TO FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE SUPPORT AND OVERSIGHT (FASO) BRANCH LEADERSHIP.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO ASSIST CPA IN PROJECT REVIEW FOR NEPA AND ESA. ASSIST PFW IN ON-GOING HABITAT RESTORATION WORK WITH PRIVATE LANDOWNERS AND NRCS. ASSIST IN ON-GOING SIKES ACT WORK AT JOINT BASE MCGUIRE-DIX-LAKEHURST.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO CONDUCT COMMON LOON FIELD SURVEYS AT LAKES IN NORTHCENTRAL MINNESOTA IN SUMMER OF 2023. THE ENROLLEE WILL CONDUCT FIELD SURVEYS AND ENTER DATA INDEPENDENTLY. FIELD  SURVEYS WILL BE CONDUCTED FROM MOTORBOAT OR NON-MOTORIZED BOAT AS APPROPRIATE. THE ENROLLEE WILL COLLECT DATA ON  COMMON LOON TERRITORY STATUS WITH A FOCUS ON BREEDING ACTIVITIES AND NESTING. DATA WILL BE ENTERED IN THE FIELD VIA AN ONLINE DATABASE.

THIS PROJECT-S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO REVIEW DRAFT OF ESA DOCUMENTS TO ENSURE STANDARD TEMPLATE LANGUAGE IS USED AND DOCUMENT IS COMPLIANT WITH CURRENT POLICIES, REGULATIONS, AND STATUTES. THIS REVIEW ENSURES THE CORRECT TEMPLATE LANGUAGE IS USED, LOGICAL PRESENTATION AND CONCLUSIONS ARE PROVIDED, AND CURRENT POLICY AND REGULATORY ANALYSES HAS BEEN CONDUCTED.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO PROVIDE REVIEW AND TECHNICAL EDITING OF IFWO DRAFT DOCUMENTS SUCH THAT THERE IS A DECREASED TIME TO FINALIZE DOCUMENTS AND PROCESSES, INCLUDING CONSULTATIONS, RECOVERY PLANS, SPECIES STATUS ASSESSMENTS, OR OTHER RELATED WORK.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO PROVIDE SURVEY RESEARCH AND ASSISTANCE TO THE DIVISION OF REALTY IN SUPPORT OF DOI SOLICITOR S OFFICE AND U.S. DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE ACTIVITIES.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD A TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKER (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE  CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO PROVIDE SHORT TERM LEGAL ISSUE CODING SUPPORT TO THE  STAFF LOCATED AT THE REGION 7 REFUGES, DIVISION OF REALTY OFFICE.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO SUPPORT THE REGION 4  FLORIDA ECOLOGICAL SERVICES IN PROVIDING COORDINATION AND COMMUNICATIONS FOR THE 2023 MANATEE UNUSUAL MORTALITY EVENT (UME).

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO PROVIDE PROJECT MANAGEMENT, COORDINATION, FACILITATION, AND TRAINING SUPPORT TO FWS R4 LIDAR PROJECT.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO SERVE IN A SUPPORT FUNCTION ON FINANCIAL MANAGEMENT OPERATIONS, INCLUSIVE OF BUDGETARY AND FISCAL MATTERS, AND THE INTERPRETATION OF BUDGETARY POLICIES AND PRACTICES.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE  CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO SERVE AS A MAINTENANCE WORKER PROVIDING GENERAL  GROUNDS AND FACILITY MAINTENANCE INCLUDING LANDSCAPING  MAINTENANCE AND REHABILITATION OF EXISTING, WORN  INFRASTRUCTURE COMPONENTS, AND NATURAL AREA, TRAIL AND FACILITIES UPKEEP, REHABILITATION, AND MAINTENANCE.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD A TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKER (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE  CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO PROVIDE SUPPORT AND TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE FWS EMPLOYEES  AS THEY COMPLETE PROCESS TO UPDATE WILDLIFE RESTORATION AND RELATED POLICIES AND OR REGULATIONS  ENGAGE SUBJECT  MATTER EXPERTS TO DETERMINE NEEDED UPDATES FOR SERVICE MANUAL CHAPTERS  ASSIST ON TEAM TO ESTABLISH COLLABORATIVE  CONSERVATION INITIATIVES  TRAIN AND MENTOR NEW STAFF OF WSFR POLICY.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE  CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO PROVIDE HISTOPATHOLOGY EXAMINATION AND REPORTING FOR  CA NV FISH HEALTH CENTER SURVEY CONTRACTS (FEATHER RIVER AND KLAMATH RIVER PROJECTS) AS WELL DIAGNOSTIC CASEWORK.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO PROVIDECRITICAL ADMINISTRATIVE SUPPORT TO THE LODI FWS OFFICE.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE  CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO PROVIDE TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE TO THE REGIONAL CLIMATE  ADAPTATION ECOLOGIST ON THE DEVELOPMENT OF A SOUTHEAST CLIMATE CHANGE ADAPTATION PROGRAM (SE CCAP), A REGIONAL  STEPPED DOWN VERSION OF THE FWS CLIMATE CHANGE ACTION PROGRAM (CCAP). THE CLIMATE ADAPTATION SPECIALIST WILL  SUPPORT SE CCAP SCOPING AND DEVELOPMENT IN LINE WITH REGIONAL PRIORITIES.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE  CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO PROVIDE SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL SERVICES SUPPORT TO  THE FWS IN FULFILLMENT OF ITS RESPONSIBILITIES FOR IMPLEMENTATION OF CERLCA RESPONSE ACTIONS AT THE CRAB ORCHARD  NATIONAL WILDLIFE REFUGE (CONWR) SITES.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO MANAGE CORRESPONDENCE, TO INCLUDE FORMATTING, GRAMMAR AND PUNCTUATION EDITING, TRACKING AND ROUTING FOR SIGNATURE  PROPERTY FLEET UTILIZATION TRACKING FOR THE REGIONAL OFFICE  AND ASSIST IN ADMINISTRATION OF SYSTEMS SUCH AS TIMEKEEPING, TRAVEL, FINANCIAL SYSTEMS.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE  CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO HIRE A WILDLIFE BIOLOGIST TO DEVELOP SHARED  RESTORATION OBJECTIVES AMONG THE PARTNERS AND QUANTITATIVE TOOLS FOR PRIORITIZING RESTORATION PROJECTS.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE  CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO PROVIDE ASSISTANCE TO THE REFUGE MANAGER BY SUPPORTING  THE VISITOR SERVICES PROGRAM, THE VEHICLE AND MAINTENANCE PROGRAM AND OVERALL ADMINISTRATIVE FUNCTIONS INCLUDING  DRAFTING PERMITS AND MOU MOA S.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE  CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO PROVIDE ANIMAL DAMAGE MANAGEMENT SERVICES TO REDUCE  DAMAGE TO REFUGE ASSETS INFRASTRUCTURE (ROADS, TRAILS, CULVERTS, WATER CONTROL STRUCTURES, LEVEES, ETC.),  WILDLIFE WILDLIFE HABITAT (AGRICULTURAL CROPS, MOIST SOIL UNITS, FOREST RESOURCES, ETC.) AND ADJACENT PRIVATE  PROPERTY. THE PRIMARY SPECIES CAUSING DAMAGE ON THE REFUGE ARE BEAVER AND FERAL HOGS. OTHER SPECIES MAY BE  INCLUDED ON A CASE BY CASE BASIS.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS  AGED 55 AND OLDER  THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO WORK AS A TECHNICAL EDITOR FOR THE BULL TROUT SSA AND BE ON RETAINER AS A TECHNICAL EDITOR FOR OTHER HIGH PROFILE SPECIES FOR THE SAT TEAM, INCLUDING WOLVERINE, GREEN SEA TURTLE, LYNX, AND OTHERS.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS  AGED 55 AND OLDER  THROUGH THE  CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO PROVIDE EXECUTIVE ADMINISTRATIVE SUPPORT TO THE  REGIONAL DIRECTOR S OFFICE.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS  AGED 55 AND OLDER  THROUGH THE  CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO HELP THE ENDANGERED SPECIES DIVISION CHIEF DEVELOP  CONSERVATION FRAMEWORKS FOR SPECIES THAT ARE BEING CONSIDERED FOR LISTING UNDER THE ENDANGERED SPECIES ACT, WHICH  INCLUDES DRAFTING CONSERVATION STRATEGIES, PROPOSED LISTING AND 4 D  RULES, AND CONSULTATION STRATEGIES.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD A TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKER  AGED 55 AND OLDER  THROUGH THE  CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO PROVIDE A DATABASE ADMINISTRATION AND DATABASE DESIGN  SERVICES TO SUPPORT THE STAFF LOCATED AT THE HQ MIGRATORY BIRD DATA REPOSITORY OFFICE.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS  AGED 55 AND OLDER  THROUGH THE  CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO SERVE AS A COURSE LEADER AND DESIGNER FOR SELECTED  RESIDENTIAL, ONLINE, AND OFFSITE COURSES OR COURSE SESSIONS RELATED TO CONSERVATION POLICY

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS  AGED 55 AND OLDER  THROUGH THE  CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO ESTABLISH AN ELECTROFISHING SAFETY PROGRAM SERVING FWS  AND TRIBES  DEVELOP A BLENDED PRINCIPLES AND  TECHNIQUES OF ELECTROFISHING COURSE, INCLUDING VIDEO MODULES AND  COURSE MANUAL FOR IN PERSON PRACTICUM  DEVELOP ELECTROFISHING SAFETY TRAINING MATERIALS FOR TRIBES  AND MENTOR  NCTC STAFF IN MANAGING FISHERIES AND AQUATIC SCIENCES CURRICULUM AND ESTABLISHING APPROPRIATE REGIONAL CONTACTS

THIS PROJECT'S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE  CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO ASSIST THE FWS IN CONDUCTING CADASTRAL LAND SURVEYS OF  NATIONAL WILDLIFE REFUGE SYSTEM (NWRS) AND NATIONAL FISH HATCHERY SYSTEM (NFHS) LANDS LOCATED IN THE STATE OF  UTAH. ENROLLEE WILL REVIEW SURVEY FIELD WORK AND PRELIMINARY SURVEY PLATS PREPARED BY FWS FIELD LAND SURVEYORS;  AS WELL AS REVIEW CADASTRAL SURVEY PLATS FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE FWS.

THE FLINT HILLS NATIONAL WILDLIFE REFUGE/REFUGES INTENDS TO HIRE AN EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM (ESP) ENROLLEE TO SERVE AS A FRONT OFFICE SPECIALIST. THE ESP ENROLLEE WILL WORK FULL-TIME AT 40 HOURS PER WEEK PROVIDING A VARIETY OF GENERAL ADMINISTRATIVE SUPPORT, SUCH AS: ANSWERING PHONES, GREETING THE PUBLIC, CREATING DOCUMENTS USING MICROSOFT WORD/EXCEL, ASSISTING WITH PROPERTY TRACKING, HANDLING, ORGANIZING AND FILING PAPERWORK, AND OTHER DUTIES AS ASSIGNED.

LAND ACQUISTION ADMINISTRATIVE SUPPORTTHIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS AGE 55 AND OLDER THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO SUPPORT REALTY SPECIALISTS IN PROVIDING DRAFTING, REVIEWING, AND COMPLETING VARIOUS DOCUMENT SUPPORT

THIS PROJECT'S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE  CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO PROVIDE FIRST-LINE SUPPORT TO OUR VISITORS AT CRAB  ORCHARD NWR. THIS ROLE WILL INCLUDE GREETING AND WELCOMING VISITORS TO THE REFUGE, PROVIDING BASIC INFORMATION  TO VISITORS, AND SALE OF PASSES AND DUCK STAMPS.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS  AGED 55 AND OLDER  THROUGH THE  CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO ASSIST WITH MAINTENANCE OF REFUGE FACILITIES AND  EQUIPMENT WITHIN THE GULF COAST COMPLEX BY OPERATING AND MAINTAINING HEAVY EQUIPMENT

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS  AGED 55 AND OLDER  THROUGH THE  CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO PROVIDE ADMINISTRATIVE SUPPORT FOR NEAL SMITH NWR AND  IA PRIVATE LANDS OFFICE BY UPDATING STATION BUDGET TRACKING SPREADSHEETS, MONITORING CREDIT CARD PURCHASES AND  RECONCILING CC STATEMENTS, FIXED COSTS TRACKED, INPUTTING PPR PR S, FBMS ACTIONS, ACQUISITION REQUESTS, AND  TRACKING IAPLO BUDGETS AND ASSOCIATED EXPENDITURES

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS  AGED 55 AND OLDER  THROUGH THE  CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO COORDINATE WITH FOREST SERVICE AND THE CORPS OF  ENGINEERS, WRITING SECTION 7 OF THE ESA DOCUMENTS, AND MAKING RECOMMENDATIONS ON MINIMIZING IMPACTS TO AQUATIC  RESOURCES  WORK ON OTHER CONSULTATIONS MAY OCCUR DEPENDING ON FOREST SERVICE AND CORPS TIMELINES

THIS PROJECT'S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE  CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO SERVE AS PRIMARY CARETAKER FOR LIVE ANIMALS, EXHIBITS,  AND FACILITY AT THE CONSERVATION LEARNING CENTER. WELCOME AND ORIENT VISITORS TO THE BLACK BAYOU LAKE NWR.

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS  AGED 55 AND OLDER  THROUGH THE  CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO CONDUCT RESTORATION ACTIONS, CREATE WILDLIFE HABITAT,  PROTECT REFUGE RESOURCES AND IMPROVE REFUGE INFRASTRUCTURE THAT WILL PROVIDE PROTECT INVALUABLE HABITAT RESOURCES  FOR THE REFUGES  TRUST RESOURCES WITH THE USE OF ENROLLEE S  PROFESSIONAL KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND ABILITIES TO  ACCOMPLISH THESE GOALS AND OBJECTIVES

THIS PROJECT S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS  AGED 55 AND OLDER  THROUGH THECONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO ASSIST IN COMPLETING LAND PROTECTION PLANS ANDASSOCIATED ENVIRONMENTAL ASSESSMENTS CONSISTENT WITH THE NATIONAL ENVIRONMENTAL POLICY ACT  NEPA   MAJOR DUTIESWILL INVOLVE OVERSEEING THE PUBLIC SCOPING PHASE OF THE PLANNING EFFORT AND DRAFTING A LAND PROTECTION PLAN ENVIRONMENTAL ASSESSMENT  THE INCUMBENT S  WILL RECEIVE DIRECTION FROM THE STATION MANAGER AND WILL COLLABORATEWITH LOCAL CONSERVATION PARTNERS

THIS PROJECT'S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE  CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO ACT AS PART OF A CREW SAMPLING BROAD WHITEFISH ON THE  KUSKOKWIM RIVER IN MCGRATH ALASKA. TECHNICIAN WILL ASSIST WITH PLANNING, UPDATE ALL TRAININGS, AND TRAVEL TO  MCGRATH ALASKA. ONCE IN THE FIELD THE TECHNICIAN WILL ASSIST A TEAM USING ELECTROFISHING TECHNIQUES TO CAPTURE,  TAGGING, AND SAMPLING BROAD WHITEFISH FOR AGE, SEX AND LENGTH. POST SEASON THE POSITION WILL ASSIST WITH DATA  ANALYSIS.

THIS PROJECT'S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE  CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO PROVIDE OVERALL GUIDANCE, OVERSIGHT, AND COORDINATION  TO THE UPPER SUSQUEHANNA CONSERVATION ALLIANCE.

THIS PROJECT'S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE  CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO PROVIDE GENERAL ADMINISTRATIVE OFFICER SUPPORT TO THE  BRANCH OF FIRE MANAGEMENT, TO INCLUDE AGREEMENT AND PROPERTY MANAGEMENT, CORRESPONDENCE AND FILE MANAGEMENT  ACTIVITIES, TIME AND TRAVEL, HR, AND CUSTOMER SERVICE SUPPORT.

THIS PROJECT'S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE  CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO SERVES AS A COURSE LEADER AND INSTRUCTOR FOR SELECTED  RESIDENTIAL, ONLINE, AND OFFSITE COURSES OR COURSE SESSIONS RELATED TO LEADERSHIP AND SUPERVISION. THE COURSE  LEADER WILL DELIVER CURRENTLY SCHEDULED LEADERSHIP AND EMPLOYEE DEVELOPMENT TRAINING, ASSIST ON NEW COURSE DESIGN  TEAMS, UPDATE COURSE MATERIALS FOR EXISTING COURSES, SUPPORT ADMINISTRATION OF RELEVANT VENDOR CONTRACTS, AND BE  ACTIVE PARTICIPANTS WITH THE REGIONAL LEADERSHIP AND EMPLOYEE DEVELOPMENT TEAM.

THIS PROJECT'S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE  CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO ASSIST WITH DIGITAL RECORDS MANAGEMENT FOR THE FWS  BRANCH OF LISTING POLICY AND SUPPORT. SPECIFICALLY, THE POSITION WILL FINALIZE AN EXISTING DRAFT FILE PLAN AND  CREATE AN IMPLEMENTATION PLAN THAT WE CAN USE TO ACHIEVE OUR DESIRED DIGITAL FILE STRUCTURE ON THE OFFICE'S  PERMANENT SERVER LOCATION IN ACCORDANCE WITH DOI AND FWS RECORDS MANAGEMENT POLICY REQUIREMENTS

THIS PROJECT'S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE  CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO PROVIDE STRATEGIC TECHNICAL EDITING SUPPORT FOR THE  WESTERN GRAY WOLF SPECIES STATUS ASSESSMENT. THE ENROLLEE WILL REVIEW AND EDIT THE SSA TO ENSURE THE DOCUMENT IS  CLEAR, CONSISTENT, PROFESSIONAL, AND PROPERLY FORMATTED.

THIS PROJECT'S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO LEAD VISITOR SERVICES PROGRAMS AT THE ALASKA PENINSULA & BECHAROF NWRS, INCLUDING ASSISTING REFUGE MANAGER IN DIRECTING WORK FOR A DIVERSE TEAM OF VISITOR SERVICES STAFF, INCLUDING VOLUNTEERS AND SCA/PARTNER HIRES AND LIAISING FOR THE REFUGE WITH REFUGE PARTNERS.

THIS PROJECT'S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO ASSIST REGION 5 IN THE FORM OF TITLE SEARCHER, LAND SURVEYOR/CONTRACT ADMIN, CAD TECHNICIAN AND DATA SPECIALIST PROFESSIONAL SUPPORT. THE TITLE SEARCHERS WILL BE SUPPLYING REALTY STAFF WITH CHAINS OF TITLE TO SUPPORT THE ACQUISITION OF LANDS AT THE REGION'S FOCAL NATIONAL WILDLIFE REFUGES FOR LAND PROTECTION. THE LAND SURVEYOR/CONTRACT ADMIN WILL ASSIST FWS WITH ELIMINATING THE REGION'S BACKLOG OF FARM SERVICE'S AGENCY CONSERVATION EASEMENT SURVEY NEEDS. THE CAD TECHNICIAN WILL BE USING AUTOCAD TO MANIPULATE DATA COLLECTED BY USFWS LAND SURVEYORS TO PREPARE PLATS OF LANDS TO BE ACQUIRED FOR THE NATIONAL WILDLIFE REFUGE SYSTEM. THE DATA SPECIALIST WILL BE SEARCHING REAL ESTATE DOCUMENTS FOR RELEVANT DATA AND ENTERING LAND ACQUISITION CASE FILE DATA INTO FWS DATABASE.

THIS PROJECT'S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKER(S) (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY-AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO PROVIDE STAFF SUPPORT FOR THE SOUTHEAST CONSERVATION ADAPTATION STRATEGY (SECAS). THIS WILL INCLUDE FACILITATING SECAS MONTHLY CALLS AND LEADERSHIP/PARTNER MEETINGS, SUPPORTING DEVELOPMENT OF A SECAS OPERATIONAL PLAN, COORDINATING SECAS ACTIONS WITH THE ASSOCIATION OF FISH AND WILDLIFE AGENCIES AND REGIONAL FISH AND WILLIFE AGENCY ASSOCIATIONS, HELPING TO PROMOTE SECAS ACTIONS AND ACCOMPLISHMENTS THROUGH VARIOUS COMMICATIONS OUTLETS, AND OTHERWISE SUPPORTING THE U.S. FISH AND WILDLIFE SERVICE SECAS COORDINATOR.

MAINTENANCE WORKER/HEAVY EQUIPMENT OPERATOR FOR HABITAT RESTORATION AT BOSQUE DEL APACHE NATIONAL WILDLIFE REFUGE:THIS PROJECT'S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO CONDUCT RESTORATION ACTIONS, CREATE WILDLIFE HABITAT, PROTECT REFUGE RESOURCES AND IMPROVE REFUGE INFRASTRUCTURE TO PROVIDE/PROTECT INVALUABLE HABITAT RESOURCES FOR THE REFUGES' TRUST RESOURCES. TASKS AND PROJECTS UNDERTAKEN UNDER THIS AGREEMENT WILL SUPPORT AND AUGMENT THE ABILITY OF THE SERVICE TO MAINTAIN AND SUPPORT REFUGE MANAGEMENT ACTIONS CAPTURED UNDER ESTABLISHED STEP-DOWN PLANS SUCH AS: THE REFUGES BIOLOGICAL PRIORITIES, THE NEW MEXICO MEADOW JUMPING MOUSE 5 YEAR PLAN, THE PLAN FOR THE MANAGEMENT OF WATERFOWL AND SANDHILL CRANES ON FEDERAL AND STATE LANDS IN THE MIDDLE RIO GRANDE VALLEY OF NEW MEXICO (WATERFOWL PLAN), AND ALL APPROPRIATE PRESCRIBED FIRE BURN PLANS. SUCCESS WILL BE MEASURED BY ACHIEVING THE GOALS LAID OUT IN THE AFOREMENTIONED DOCUMENTS.

THIS PROJECT'S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGE 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO PROVIDE TECHNICAL SUPPORT AND PRODUCT DEVELOPMENT FOR SITE-SPECIFIC SURVEY PROTOCOLS AND HABITAT MANAGEMENT PLANS.

YUKON DELTA NWR IS PROPOSING WORK WITH THE ESP PROGRAM TO PROVIDE SUPPORT TO REFUGE ACTIVITIES WITH A SEASONAL PILOT AND ADMINISTRATIVE ASSISTANT. THE PROPOSED WORK WOULD PROVIDE ADDITIONAL SUPPORT TO THE REFUGE IN THE BUSIEST MONTHS BETWEEN APRIL AND AUGUST.

THIS PROJECT'S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO ADD TEMPORARY, EXPERIENCED, SKILLED WORKERS (AGED 55 AND OLDER) THROUGH THE  CONGRESSIONALLY AUTHORIZED EXPERIENCED SERVICES PROGRAM TO MANAGE AND MAINTAIN PUBLIC USE FACILITIES AT CRESCENT  LAKE AND NORTH PLATTE NATIONAL WILDLIFE REFUGES IN NEBRASKA. THIS WILL INCLUDE MONITORING AND MAINTAINING BOAT  DOCKS AND BOAT LAUNCHES, MOWING AND MAINTAINING HIKING TRAILS, INVENTORYING AND REPLACING SIGNS, PAINTING AND  MAINTAINING DISPLAYS AT KIOSKS, MONITORING AND FILLING BROCHURE DISPENSERS, MOWING AND MAINTAINING ROADSIDES AND  PARKING AREAS, MONITORING GATES AND SEASONAL CLOSURE AREAS, REMOVING LITTER, MOWING LAWNS AND MAINTAINING  SPRINKLER SYSTEMS, MAINTAIN WILDLIFE VIEWING BLINDS. SUCCESS WILL BE MEASURED BY THE ACCOMPLISHMENT OF THE TASKS  LISTED IN THE SOW AND PD.

NOWCC (AS OF MARCH 1, 2022, WE HAVE CHANGED OUR NAME TO NATIONAL EXPERIENCED WORKFORCE SOLUTIONS, OR NEW  SOLUTIONS FOR SHORT) WILL WORK WITH THE FWS TO RECRUIT, SCREEN, AND ENROLL AN EXPERIENCED WORKER AGE 55+ TO  FULFILL THE APPROVED SCOPE OF WORK:  THE SELECTED PROFESSIONAL WILL LEAD PLANNING EFFORTS FOR THE BATTLE OF MIDWAY 80TH MEMORIAL IN JUNE 2022. THE  80TH MEMORIAL WILL OCCUR IN TWO LOCATIONS, A SMALL INTIMATE CEREMONY ON MIDWAY ATOLL AND A LARGER CEREMONY ON  OAHU. THE CEREMONY ON OAHU WILL BE IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE AND POSSIBLY OTHER GOVERNMENT  ENTITIES. THE TASKS INCLUDE DEVELOPING A PROGRAM FOR BOTH CEREMONIES, MANAGING LOGISTICS OF BRINGING VETERANS TO  MIDWAY ATOLL AND HONOLULU AND ENSURING THEIR SAFETY AND TRANSPORT ONCE ON OAHU. WORKING WITH PARTNERS TO PLAN  SIMULTANEOUS EVENTS OR PARTICIPATION IN A SINGLE EVENT. LEADING EFFORTS TO SECURE VENUES AND INVITE KEY  REPRESENTATIVES. DEVELOPING VISUAL AND PRINTED MATERIALS FOR THE CEREMONIES. WILL WORK CLOSELY WITH TWO FWS  LEADS.
